data.title: 150415 - Verisign Recursive DNS
data.meta_description: 150415 - Verisign Recursive DNS - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
2. Verisign Public VERISIGN WORLDWIDE INTERNET CONSTELLATION 2 Verisign DNS Resolution sites Manages nearly half of the Internet’s domain names Connects with over 600 networks at 1,200 points of interconnection 76+ global points of presence 1.6+ Tbps global capacity in 2015 Proven operational expertise from running .COM and .NET global DNS infrastructure for over 17 years with 100% availability Approximate DNS queries processed daily 110 Billion A leader in critical infrastructure protection, representing more than 70% of global commerce

3. Verisign Public WHAT IS RECURSIVE CONTENT? 3 Essential component of nearly all communication on the Internet The first link in the DNS lookup chain ISP Internet Service Providers Enterprises End Users Provides the intelligent routing for Internet navigation User types URL into a browser RECURSIVE DNS RESOLVERThe URL is sent to the recursive DNS resolver ROOT SERVERS Resolver checks with the root server to find where to go to get the IP addresses for URLs that end in .COM AUTHORITATIVE SERVERS This server knows the IP address for the full domain and returns the answer to the recursive DNS resolver 1 2 3 5 Browser goes to www.verisigninc.com7 6 The recursive DNS resolver returns actual address, www.verisigninc.com (72.13.63.55) WWW.VERISIGNINC.COM TLD NAME SERVERS The TLD name server answers with the IP address of the authoritative server for that domain 4

4. Verisign Public 4 INBOUND COMPLETE DNS ECOSYSTEM OUTBOUND

5. Verisign Public TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP VERISIGN RECURSIVE DNS 5 STABILITY SECURITY PRIVACY Utilizes patented, proprietary ATLAS technology Less vulnerable to security flaws than other DNS platforms 100% operational accuracy and stability of .COM and .NET zones worldwide Over 17 years providing highly reliable DNS service No hardware investment, maintenance or in-house resources required Leverages Verisign’s extensive experience and knowledge in DNS Infrastructure Verisign respects your privacy Your recursive DNS data will not be sold to third parties Verisign will not redirect your queries to serve you ads 100% Reduces overall threat exposure Offers a lower TCO Scale services as needed

6. Verisign Public STABILITY SECURITY KEY BENEFITS 6 PRIVACY Trust that your business critical queries will be responded to as expected without alteration Proven protection from security flaws and other vulnerabilities Confidence in a platform with commitment of availability Assertion that your data is protected TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP Opportunity to redirect resources to more critical areas of your business Reduce overall cost in a platform that is outside core business objectives Assurance that the service will adapt seamlessly to your changing business needs without additional investment

7. Verisign Public 7 IPv6 System Status Cache Flushing EDNS Client Subnet DNSSEC Validation CORE FEATURES

8. Verisign Public CHOOSE THE IMPLEMENTATION THAT BEST MEETS YOUR NEEDS 8 Replace Augment Backup ISP ISP ISP
